dialoges.name: Me
sentences: Huh what is this place?
It looks like some sort of facility.

dialoges.name: Me
sentences: Whoa what is happening?
It looks like the alarm is going towards the door.

dialoges.name: Me
sentences: It looks like this is some kind of layout for the basement.
Maybe I could use this to figure out where I need to go.

dialoges.name: Me
sentences: I should probably take this with me.

dialoges.name: Me
sentences: Everything is fixed now. I should go upstairs.

dialoges.name: Me
sentences: It looks like something is blinking on that big screen.

dialoges.name: Me
sentences: This key card on the ground could be useful later.

dialoges.name: Me
sentences: The screen changed again, I should check it out.

dialoges.name: Me
sentences: A squid swam into that room with a key card. Maybe I can catch it on a dead end.

dialoges.name: Me
sentences: This room doesn't have a dead end, I should try to get it out.

dialoges.name: Me
sentences: I can't catch it in this room either. I should get him out.

dialoges.name: Me
sentences: This room probably has a dead end where I can catch him.

dialoges.name: Me
sentences: I can probably use this key card somewhere.
I should check the screen, maybe something changed.

dialoges.name: Me
sentences: It sounds like the monster is swimming away.
I could try to get back up to the surface using the emergency route.

dialoges.name: Hint
sentences: Use the scroll wheel to switch between items in your inventory
